title: How YouTube Kids Cleaned Up Its Act
sub_head: Former employees say platform embraced human curation over virality to address criticism it wasnâ€™t doing enough to protect younger consumers
body:
When YouTube set out to create a product for children, employees thought it could be built like its main video-streaming platform: ruled by algorithms with little human intervention.
They learned, several years after launch, that they were wrong, according to former employees.
